text: National Museum of Korea (, 國立中央博物館) is a national museum in Yongsan District, Seoul. It was opened in Changgyeong Palace in 1909 and reopened in Yongsan District in 2005. == Other websites == * National Museum of Korea Category:1900s establishments in Korea Category:1909 establishments in Asia Category:2005 establishments in South Korea Category:Museums in Seoul Korea
title: National Museum of Korea
